verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* way Jacob \w came|strong="H7725"\w* face \w to|strong="H7725"\w* face \w with|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* angels \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* saw \w them|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* said, This \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* army \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* gave \w that|strong="H1980"\w* place \w the|strong="H1870"\w* name \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Mahanaim.

\w Now|strong="H2088"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* servants \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Esau|strong="H0559"\w*, \w his|strong="H0834"\w* brother, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Seir, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w country|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Edom;

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w gave|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* orders \w to|strong="H0413"\w* say these words \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*: \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* servant \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* says, Till now \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w been|strong="H0776"\w* living \w with|strong="H0413"\w* Laban:

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* oxen \w and|strong="H5650"\w* asses \w and|strong="H5650"\w* flocks \w and|strong="H5650"\w* men-servants \w and|strong="H5650"\w* women-servants: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w my|strong="H3290"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w news|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* these \w things|strong="H5973"\w* \w so|strong="H3541"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* grace \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* eyes.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0113"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* back they said, \w We|strong="H4672"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w seen|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* brother Esau \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* coming \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* four hundred \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* great fear \w and|strong="H1980"\w* trouble \w of|strong="H0376"\w* mind: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* flocks \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* herds \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* camels \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* groups;

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* said, \w If|strong="H0834"\w* Esau, meeting \w one|strong="H0834"\w* group, makes an attack \w on|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w others|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* get away safely.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H0518"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father \w Abraham|strong="H0559"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father \w Isaac|strong="H0559"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w who|strong="H6413"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* \w back|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* country \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* family \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* good \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* less than nothing \w in|strong="H0413"\w* comparison \w with|strong="H5973"\w* all \w your|strong="H3068"\w* mercies \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* servant; \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* only \w my|strong="H3068"\w* stick \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w went|strong="H7725"\w* across Jordan, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H3327"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w become|strong="H7725"\w* two armies.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* saviour \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5650"\w* Esau, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brother: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* attack \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w putting|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* death mother \w and|strong="H5650"\w* child.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w Truly|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* good \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* seed \w like|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sea which \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* numbered.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* tent \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* night; \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w from|strong="H5973"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* goods \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* offering \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* brother \w Esau|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Two|strong="H3947"\w* hundred she-goats \w and|strong="H0935"\w* twenty he-goats, \w two|strong="H3947"\w* hundred females \w and|strong="H0935"\w* twenty males \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* sheep,
Thirty camels \w with|strong="H6242"\w* their young \w ones|strong="H0352"\w*, forty cows, ten oxen, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* ten young asses.

These \w he|strong="H1121"\w* gave \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* servants, every herd \w by|strong="H1121"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1121"\w* servants, Go \w on|strong="H0860"\w* before \w me|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* let there \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1121"\w* space between \w one|strong="H1121"\w* herd \w and|strong="H1121"\w* another.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w first|strong="H6440"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w When|strong="H5674"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* brother \w Esau|strong="H0559"\w* \w comes|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w says|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Whose|strong="H5650"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w where|strong="H0413"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* going, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w whose|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w these|strong="H7760"\w* \w herds|strong="H5739"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* servant Jacob's; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* offering \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* lord, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*; \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* coming \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* second \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* third \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w those|strong="H0310"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* herds, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w what|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*;

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* further, \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* servant, \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w coming|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*. \w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w himself|strong="H0413"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w take|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* offering \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w then|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w it|strong="H1980"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* grace \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* eyes.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* rest \w that|strong="H3588"\w* night \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* tents \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* got \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* taking \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* two wives \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* two servant-women \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* eleven children, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H6440"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* river Jabbok.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sent|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* stream \w with|strong="H0802"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Jacob \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H0834"\w* himself; \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* man \w was|strong="H0834"\w* fighting \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* till dawn.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* saw \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* not able \w to|strong="H5704"\w* overcome \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* gave \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w blow|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* hollow \w part|strong="H0905"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* leg, \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* leg \w was|strong="H0376"\w* damaged.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* go \w now|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dawn \w is|strong="H3709"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* go till \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* given \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* blessing.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w What|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H7837"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H0559"\w*? \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3290"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Your|strong="H0413"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H3290"\w* no longer \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w but|strong="H0559"\w* Israel: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H0413"\w* fight \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H3290"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* overcome.

\w Then|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w What|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*? \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w What|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*? \w Then|strong="H0559"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* blessing.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Peniel, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* seen \w God|strong="H0559"\w* face \w to|strong="H0559"\w* face, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w still|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* am living.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* going past \w Peniel|strong="H6439"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sun \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w*. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* unequal steps \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* damaged leg.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w reason|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Israel, \w even|strong="H0853"\w* today, never take \w that|strong="H0834"\w* muscle \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hollow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* leg \w as|strong="H0834"\w* food, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hollow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob's leg \w was|strong="H0834"\w* touched.
